function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High prevalence of flourishing declined significantly","Impact":"Negative impact on overall public health and well-being","Mitigation":"Implement measures to support and promote flourishing in the population","Technologies":"Community health programs, mental health support services","People":"Danish population","Owner":"Public health authorities"},{"Description":"Association between low flourishing and high healthcare utilization","Impact":"Increased burden on healthcare services and resources","Mitigation":"Promote and support measures to improve flourishing and overall well-being","Technologies":"Integrated healthcare systems, mental health services","People":"Individuals with low flourishing","Owner":"Healthcare providers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Baseline well-being associated with higher future healthcare costs","Impact":"Increased healthcare expenditure and financial burden on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Implement interventions to improve well-being and prevent future healthcare costs","Technologies":"Wellness programs, preventive care services","People":"Healthcare system, insurers","Owner":"Healthcare providers, insurance companies"}]}
